name: 4xPlattaforms
description:
A game made for the Jammintonns4.0 Game Jam,This has been the very first game i have ever developed in a Game Jam,its still a bit rusty but has potential.

Based around WidowMakers hook Mechanic you objetive is to get as many points  as  you cant get wihout diying in the process,at the same time that you go up swinging in platfforms and triying not to fall into the red pit of Doom
